hooks.command: powershell.exe -Command "[Windows.UI.Notifications.ToastNotificationManager, Windows.UI.Notifications, ContentType = WindowsRuntime] > \$null; \$t = [Windows.UI.Notifications.ToastNotificationManager]::GetTemplateContent([Windows.UI.Notifications.ToastTemplateType]::ToastText02); \$n = \$t.GetElementsByTagName('text'); \$n.Item(0).AppendChild(\$t.CreateTextNode('Claude Code')) > \$null; \$n.Item(1).AppendChild(\$t.CreateTextNode('Task complete')) > \$null; [Windows.UI.Notifications.ToastNotificationManager]::CreateToastNotifier('Claude Code').Show([Windows.UI.Notifications.ToastNotification]::new(\$t))"
